sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: fcp_one_col_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image with minimum dimensions px X px

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: fcp_gallery_layout
sub_fields.instructions:
Layout Variation 1: Images will be displayed in an image slider
Layout Variation 2: Images will be displayed in a grid

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images_v1
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image with minimum dimensions px X px

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images_v2
sub_fields.instructions:
Upload an image with minimum dimensions px X px
The number of images uploaded should be multiplications of 4.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: fcp_video_layout
sub_fields.instructions:
Layout Variation 1: One column video section - video will be played inside the container
Layout Variation 2: Two column video section - Videos will be played inside a pop-up

sub_fields.label: Do You Want to Add Controls
sub_fields.name: fcp_video_add_controls

sub_fields.name: video_options_v1
sub_fields.instructions:

Video File : Upload Video File
